description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 21/02813/VAR: verification report (19) with respect to Plots 82-84 and 92-95 (Phase 1a), West Wing and Orangery (Phase 1b), Plots 1 to 20 , North Eastern area and Stable Block (Phase 2), Building 5 ,Plots 122 to 127 and Plots 21 to 52 (Phase 3), and Walled Garden and Plots 112 & 113 (Phase 4) for phased redevelopment of site to provide a total of 251 residential units with museum, cafe and leisure uses, ancillary parking, vehicle and pedestrian access routes and cycle ways with associated works.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Former Middlesex University Trent Park Campus Trent Country ParkSnakes LaneEnfieldEN4 0PS
